schema.description: Starts a new auction with the given parameters. The auction info can be modified before it has started but is immutable after that.

start_time.description: Start time in milliseconds since epoch
start_time.title: Start time

schema.title: Cw721 start auction

coin_denom.ui:help: Denomination of the coin for the auction bid.

duration.ui:title: Auction Duration
duration.ui:description: Set the auction duration in milliseconds.
duration.ui:help: Enter the duration of the auction. The value should be in milliseconds.

min_bid.ui:description: Enter the minimum bid amount. Should be lower case and micro units. 100000 micro-andr (called uandr) is equal to 1 andr

start_time.ui:title: Auction Start Time
start_time.ui:description: Set the auction start time in milliseconds since epoch.
start_time.ui:help: Choose the start time for the auction. The value will appear in milliseconds since the epoch.
